title: Curriculum Vitae: A Volume of Autobiography
author: Spark, Muriel
snippet: The small office at the top of Bush House was a kind of eyrie overlooking London. The man who interviewed me looked far too big for the room.

title: Curriculum Vitae: A Volume of Autobiography
author: Spark, Muriel
snippet: She rang up there and then and made an appointment for my interview. I was to go to the very top floor of Bush House in Aldwych. Tell no one.
